name: WellTown
description: Have you ever wanted to take a trip to the creative heart of New Zealand? Grab your headset and join our exuberant guide on your own personal virtual tour of Wellington!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 16 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-7600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Gefore GTX 1080 equivalent or greater Storage: 16 GB available space
